name: Linux Cascade Bonding Equalizer
short_description:
Linux Cascade Bonding.

Kernel module and userspace tools for register multiple network interfaces and link it (in a priority fashion) together in a multiple "bond" arquitecture. Then the kernel may choose alternative paths (routes) to send the packet
